title: Self-reported Quality of Life at Middle School Age in Survivors of Very Preterm Birth: Results From the Caffeine for Apnea of Prematurity Trial.
abstract: This study examined the self-reported quality of life in an international cohort of 11-year-old children with birth weights of 500 to 1250 g.
